newsitem.title: CHINA: Shanghai T-bill repo rates mostly down, spot mixed.
newsitem.headline: Shanghai T-bill repo rates mostly down, spot mixed.

text.p: Contracts on the treasury bill repurchase market in Shanghai closed mostly down on Friday after the completion of a major new A share issue from the dam operating and construction firm Gezhouba Co Ltd, traders said.
The annual rate for the most active seven-day contract fell to 13.60 percent from 15.30 percent on Thursday.
Total turnover of the six-contract market was 4.86 million lots today. One lot is 1,000 yuan face value of treasury bills.
Traders said the end of the Gezhouba issue was the main factor pulling rates down. But the rebound on the A share market on Friday encouraged some short-term speculators to buy, they said.
